ðŸ”´ Overview
The YouTube Embed Code Generator is a Chrome extension designed to simplify the process of creating embed codes for YouTube videos. This tool allows users to quickly generate an iframe embed code for any YouTube video link, making it easy to integrate videos into websites or presentations. The extension also provides a live preview of the embedded video, ensuring accuracy and ease of use.

ðŸ”´ Key Features
The YouTube Embed Code Generator makes embedding videos easy. You can instantly create iframe embed codes for any YouTube video. The live preview shows how the video will look on your webpage, and the one-click copy feature saves time. It also includes error handling to validate YouTube URLs and has a user-friendly design for a smooth experience.

ðŸ”´ Disclaimer
This tool generates embed codes for public YouTube videos only. Videos with restricted or private settings may not work. Always follow YouTubeâ€™s terms of service and copyright rules. The extension processes data locally and does not store or track user information.
